main.title: Productivity. Collaboration. Simplicity.
main.subtitle: Offer your employees a complete solution that supports them in their daily organization.

step_1.text: Define your hybrid work criteria and rules and seamlessly plug Ceercle with your favorite HR software and work tools.

step_2.title_2_color: the use of your office spaces.
step_2.text: Track the organization of your teams with a complete dashboard. Analyze the use of your office spaces and keep an eye on your teams' well-being.

step_3.text: With Ceercle, your employees fill in a shared weekly attendance schedule within the company. Say goodbye to lost information.

step_4.title_1: Book a desk in your office
step_4.text: Your employees can now book a desk alongside the employees of their choice and come to work in the best conditions.
